mapper.select: SELECT bp.PRCD,bp.`NAME`,bp.ADCD,ea.ADNM,ea.TOWNADNM,bp.project_scale,bp.PRLV,ei.VILLAGE_NAME VILLAGE,bp.project_category, po.`NAME` polder_name,ml.MAX_FLOW FROM dts_yh_basic_data_db_bm_project bp LEFT JOIN dts_yh_basic_data_db_bm_ei_adcd ea ON bp.ADCD = ea.ADCD LEFT JOIN dts_yh_basic_data_db_bm_sluice_ei ei ON ei.PRCD = bp.PRCD LEFT JOIN dts_yh_basic_data_db_project_rel rel ON rel.rel_code = bp.PRCD LEFT JOIN dts_yh_basic_data_db_bm_project po ON po.PRCD = rel.prcd LEFT JOIN dts_yh_basic_data_db_ml_sluice_directory ml ON ml.PRCD = bp.PRCD WHERE bp.PRCD = #{prcd}
